name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant red body adorned with black accents, Circuit stands out among its robotic peers. Its box-shaped frame, named 'rossoCorsa', houses a sleek red and black screen that displays intricate waveforms and data. Circuit's 'handDown' arms and legs allow it to maneuver with precision, while its 'cat' buttons provide it with a playful touch. To complete its stylish look, Circuit sports a pair of 'shades' addons, adding a cool and mysterious aura to its appearance.
